description: This schema defines uoms in JSON format. A simpler version is in uom.schema.json
title: Lean Unit of Measure (UOM) Schema

UOM_ref.description: References the 'id' field of a uom in the 'UOM' array

description.const: The unit of measure is unknown
A boolean value where 0 = False, 1 = True
The list index of a value for a given list of values.
Number of Cubic Meters per Hour
The raw value used by the device
Seismic activity level using the Richter Scale
A 1-360 degree clockwise Wind Direction, 0 indicates no wind
On or off, where Off=0, On=100, Unknown=101
Open or Closed, where Open=0, Closed=100, Unknown=101
The running state of the Fan
Frequency in Hertz (1 hertz = one cycle per second)
Degrees relative to north pole of standing eye view
Degrees relative to south pole of standing eye view
A Level from 0-255 (for example, the brightness of a dimmable lamp)
Most recent On style action taken for lamp control
Millibars, typically used in barometric reports
Hectopascals, typically used in barometric reports
Color XY (usually a value between 0.00000 to 1.00000)
